item.title: A Simple Tic Tac Toe Game in C
item.description: Tic Tac Toe (T3), a two-player game developed in C/C++ in 2006-2007 For the school project in C++ in standard 11, I chose to make a game. Although the game doesn’t feature AI, it demonstrates the graphics and sound capabilities of C/C++ with Turbo C++ compiler.
